original_title: Gordan Goodwin's Big Phat Band: Act Your Age
overview: This DVD/CD set features more deft songwriting and arranging by Gordon Goodwin along with guest musicians Chick Corea, Patti Austin, Lee Ritenour, Dave Grusin, and Art Tatum in a virtual duet. The DVD features the complete album in 5.1 surround sound, com
title: Gordan Goodwin's Big Phat Band: Act Your Age
